name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Attention Please!! Special Tea Party with Pavolia Reine!!! #PavoliaReine3D [aBgFX_2oIU4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'God-ish' (Kamishippoi na) by Pavolia Reine and Houshou Marine.
MC section with Reine and Marine after their performance.
Reine alone on stage, talking to the audience before a commercial break.
Pavolia Reine Membership Promotional Video: 'The Royaltea'.
Performance of the song 'Illusion Night' by Pavolia Reine.

subtitles.original: きっしょいね きっしょいね それきっしょいね きっしょいね
subtitles.english: Gross, right? Gross, right? That's gross, right? Gross, right?

subtitles.original: 逆にファンになってきたじゃん
subtitles.english: I've actually become a fan now.

subtitles.original: ちっちゃいね ちっちゃいね 器ちっちゃいね ちっちゃいね
subtitles.english: Small, right? Small, right? Your capacity is small, right? Small, right?

subtitles.original: 出した手引っ込めてご苦労様
subtitles.english: Thanks for your hard work pulling back your hand.

subtitles.original: かっけえ...
subtitles.english: Cool...

subtitles.original: God...
subtitles.english: God...

subtitles.original: 神っぽいな それ 卑怯 神っぽいな それ 卑怯
subtitles.english: God-ish, that's unfair. God-ish, that's unfair.

subtitles.original: 条件公約遵守してくたばっていく感じ
subtitles.english: The feeling of complying with conditions and pledges then dying.

subtitles.original: ヤケっぽいな それ 卑怯 ヤケっぽいな それ 卑怯
subtitles.english: Desperate-ish, that's unfair. Desperate-ish, that's unfair.

subtitles.original: 愛執 愛執 エピゴーネンの日
subtitles.english: Attachment, attachment, day of the epigone.

subtitles.original: そのタイトル その絵 そのストーリー その音楽 その歌 そのメロディ
subtitles.english: That title, that art, that story, that music, that song, that melody.

subtitles.original: あれっぽいな それ 卑怯 あれっぽいな それ 卑怯
subtitles.english: Like that-ish, that's unfair. Like that-ish, that's unfair.

subtitles.original: その名言 その意見 その批評 そのカリスマ そのギャグ そのセンス
subtitles.english: That quote, that opinion, that criticism, that charisma, that joke, that sense.

subtitles.original: 神っぽいな それ 卑怯 ぽいな ぽいな ぽい 憧れちゃうわ
subtitles.english: God-ish, that's unfair. -ish, -ish, -ish, I'm starting to admire it.

subtitles.original: とぅ とぅる とぅ とぅ とぅる... ぽいじゃん ぽいじゃん
subtitles.english: Tu turu tu tu turu... -ish, right? -ish, right?

subtitles.original: とぅ とぅる とぅ とぅ とぅる... “神”
subtitles.english: Tu turu tu tu turu... 'God'.

subtitles.original: 愛のネタバレ 別れっぽいな
subtitles.english: Spoiler of love, it seems like a breakup.

subtitles.original: 人生のネタバレ 死ぬっぽいな
subtitles.english: Spoiler of life, it seems like dying.

subtitles.original: すべて理解して煩った
subtitles.english: Understanding everything, I became troubled.

subtitles.original: 無邪気に踊っていたかった 人生
subtitles.english: I wanted to dance innocently, life.

subtitles.original: マリン先輩、ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Marine-senpai, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: レイネおめでとう！お披露目呼んでくれてありがとうね。
subtitles.english: Congratulations, Reine! Thank you for inviting me to your showcase.

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌えて楽しかったよ。
subtitles.english: I had a lot of fun singing with you.

subtitles.original: わー！マリン先輩大好きですー！
subtitles.english: Wow! I love you, Marine-senpai!

subtitles.original: マリンも大好きだよ。またね。頑張ってね。バイバイ！
subtitles.english: I love you too, Reine. See you later. Good luck. Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: やー、嬉しいな。
subtitles.english: Man, I'm so happy.

subtitles.original: えー、それじゃあ、そろそろラストの曲なんですが、
subtitles.english: Well then, it's almost time for the last song,

subtitles.original: その前に、CMです！
subtitles.english: but before that, here's a commercial!

subtitles.original: Attention please! Are you somebody looking for a new experience?
subtitles.english: Attention please! Are you somebody looking for a new experience?

subtitles.original: Are you by any chance a MERAKyats who just can't wait for when I'm going to be implementing a certain feature?
subtitles.english: Are you by any chance a MERAKyats who just can't wait for when I'm going to be implementing a certain feature?

subtitles.original: Or are you simply wanting to get a head start with flexing using super amazing badges and cute emojis?
subtitles.english: Or are you simply wanting to get a head start with flexing using super amazing badges and cute emojis?

subtitles.original: Well, you're in luck! My name is Pavolia Reine,
subtitles.english: Well, you're in luck! My name is Pavolia Reine,

subtitles.original: and I'm going to be here explaining briefly what is going on with Pavolia Reine's membership. (That is mine, by the way.)
subtitles.english: and I'm going to be here explaining briefly what is going on with Pavolia Reine's membership. (That is mine, by the way.)

subtitles.original: At The Royaltea, our super advanced magical technology grants you badge flexing rights,
subtitles.english: At The Royaltea, our super advanced magical technology grants you badge flexing rights,

subtitles.original: which you can constantly show off every time you're here with us.
subtitles.english: which you can constantly show off every time you're here with us.

subtitles.original: We also make sure to provide you with utmost care and sense of belonging
subtitles.english: We also make sure to provide you with utmost care and sense of belonging

subtitles.original: by granting you a one-of-a-kind experience with cute emojis.
subtitles.english: by granting you a one-of-a-kind experience with cute emojis.

subtitles.original: At just the right price, you'll be able to join our exclusive Royaltea parties,
subtitles.english: At just the right price, you'll be able to join our exclusive Royaltea parties,

subtitles.original: which also means membership-exclusive streams
subtitles.english: which also means membership-exclusive streams

subtitles.original: in which we can have various talks, play games together, and do other miscellaneous member involvements.
subtitles.english: in which we can have various talks, play games together, and do other miscellaneous member involvements.

subtitles.original: Like what, you might ask?
subtitles.english: Like what, you might ask?

subtitles.original: Only one way to find out.
subtitles.english: Only one way to find out.

subtitles.original: And lastly, safety isn't guaranteed, but it is...
subtitles.english: And lastly, safety isn't guaranteed, but it is...

subtitles.original: ...SAFETY IS GUARANTEED GUARANTEED...
subtitles.english: ...SAFETY IS GUARANTEED GUARANTEED...

subtitles.original: ...development training in which we aim to build a community of people who like living dangerously.
subtitles.english: ...development training in which we aim to build a community of people who like living dangerously.

subtitles.original: We welcome everybody with open arms to join The Royaltea.
subtitles.english: We welcome everybody with open arms to join The Royaltea.

subtitles.original: Illusion Night
subtitles.english: Illusion Night

subtitles.original: Kiss me ふらつかないで
subtitles.english: Kiss me, don't stagger

subtitles.original: Tell me 甘い言葉で
subtitles.english: Tell me with sweet words

subtitles.original: Give me 君のすべてを
subtitles.english: Give me all of you

subtitles.original: 今この幻想で
subtitles.english: Now in this illusion

subtitles.original: ただつながる時間 委ねていてね
subtitles.english: Just surrender to the time we're connected

subtitles.original: 声を枯らすくらい 心臓で叫べ
subtitles.english: Shout with your heart until your voice goes hoarse

subtitles.original: 今更恋なんて思わない 変わりはいくらでもいるわ
subtitles.english: I won't think of it as love now; there are plenty of replacements

subtitles.original: 熱く燃えるほど愛おしくて 騒がしい街へ
subtitles.english: So dear as it burns hotly, to the noisy city

subtitles.original: また夜が明けて
subtitles.english: And the dawn breaks again

subtitles.original: まだまだ終わらない Show time ほら踊り明かそう
subtitles.english: Show time isn't over yet, hey, let's dance the night away

subtitles.original: クラクラしちゃうくらいに 見つめてね
subtitles.english: Stare at me until you feel dizzy

subtitles.original: Take me 深い夜まで
subtitles.english: Take me until the deep night

subtitles.original: Touch me 気の向くままに
subtitles.english: Touch me as you please

subtitles.original: Trust me 夢いざなう 飽きるまでずっと
subtitles.english: Trust me, I'll invite you into a dream, forever until you're tired of it
